snippet: Yohan Blake beat gold medalist Usain Bolt in the Jamaican Olympic trials. On Sunday, they will compete in the Olympics’ most anticipated event, the men’s 100 meter dash.
abstract: Inside the Rings; Jamaican sprinter Yohan Blake and his gold medalist countryman Usain Bolt are set to square off in the men's 100-meter dash, the Olympics' most anticipated event; Blake outran Bolt at the Jamaican Olympic trials.
lead_paragraph: Yohan Blake beat gold medalist Usain Bolt in the Jamaican Olympic trials. On Sunday, they will compete in the Olympics’ most anticipated event, the men’s 100 meter dash.

headline.seo: The Beast (Blake) and Bolt Ready for Olympic Dustup in Sprints
headline.main: Usain Bolt’s Training Partner May Leave Him Behind
headline.print_headline: Beast And Bolt Get Ready For Dust-Up
